stake.title: Digital Asset Staking
stake.subtitle: Lock your assets and receive periodic rewards

empty.title: No stake contract available
empty.description: There are no public stake contracts available at the moment

infoCard.title: How does Staking work?
infoCard.benefit1: Earnings paid periodically according to the chosen plan
infoCard.benefit3: Different levels of risk and return available
infoCard.description: Staking allows you to lock your digital assets for a specified period in exchange for periodic rewards. The longer the lock period, the higher the rewards.

errors.loadContracts: Error loading stake contracts. Please try again later.

analysis.title: Analysis and Insights
analysis.description: This section will be available soon with detailed charts and market analysis.

infoCard.title: About Crypto Assets
infoCard.description: Invest in digital assets with high appreciation potential. Crypto assets offer exposure to the digital currency market with different levels of risk and return.

empty.title: No fixed income investments available
empty.description: There are no fixed income products available at the moment

infoCard.title: About Digital Fixed Income
infoCard.description: Investments with predictable returns and lower volatility. Ideal for investors seeking security and consistent profitability with regular payments.

card.tooltipInfo: Smart stake contract for business participation investment.

empty.title: No Pedacinho Pratique contract found
empty.description: There are no stake contracts with "Pedacinho Pratique" available at the moment

empty.title: No variable income investments available
empty.description: There are no variable income products available at the moment

infoCard.title: About Digital Variable Income
infoCard.description: Products with variable returns based on royalties and participations. Offers potential for higher profitability with periodic payments linked to asset performance.

empty.title: No private offers available
empty.description: You are not authorized for any private offers at the moment

errors.loadContracts: Error loading private offers. Please try again later.

productCard.cdiTooltip: Reference CDI value updated on {{date}}. Used purely for comparison purposes.

sidebar.taxExemptionText: Exempt from income tax when sales (token liquidation) do not exceed R$ 35,000 per month.

productHeader.taxExemption: Exempt from income tax when sales (token liquidation) do not exceed R$ 35,000 per month.

transactionsModal.title: Investment history in {{productCode}}
transactionsModal.emptyState: No investments in this asset yet

stake.title: Stake in Contract
stake.description: Enter the amount you want to stake in the contract.
stake.decimalHint: Use comma for decimals (e.g., 1,197.654365) or period which will be automatically converted
stake.insufficientBalanceDesc: You do not have sufficient balance for this operation
stake.emissionLimitDesc: The maximum amount available for investment is {{available}} {{symbol}}
stake.noteDesc: The stake will be processed on the blockchain and you will start receiving rewards based on the invested amount.
stake.importantDesc: After clicking "Confirm Stake", wait on the screen while the transaction is processed on the blockchain. The screen will close automatically when the transaction is confirmed.
stake.errorInvalidAmount: Enter a valid amount to stake
stake.errorMaxEmission: The maximum amount available for investment is {{available}} {{symbol}}. Total emission limit: {{totalEmission}} {{symbol}}
stake.maxAdjusted: Maximum value adjusted to {{amount}} {{symbol}}. This is the available limit in the contract. Your balance: {{balance}} {{symbol}}
stake.emissionLimitFull: Emission limit reached. There is no more space available for new investments in this contract.

unstake.title: Unstake from Contract
unstake.description: Enter the amount you want to unstake from the contract.
unstake.decimalHint: Use comma for decimals (e.g., 1,197.654365) or period which will be automatically converted
unstake.noteDesc: The unstake will be processed on the blockchain and the amount will be removed from your stake balance in the contract.
unstake.importantDesc: After clicking "Confirm Unstake", wait on the screen while the transaction is processed on the blockchain. The screen will close automatically when the transaction is confirmed.
unstake.errorInvalidAmount: Enter a valid amount to unstake
unstake.exceedsStakeDesc: The maximum amount you can withdraw is {{stakeBalance}} {{symbol}}

compound.title: Reinvest Rewards
compound.description: Your rewards will be automatically reinvested to generate more earnings.
compound.emissionLimitDesc: Cannot reinvest because the amount to reinvest ({{rewardsValue}} {{symbol}}) exceeds the available limit ({{available}} {{symbol}}). Total emission limit: {{totalEmission}} {{symbol}}. Please claim your receivables first.
compound.noteDesc: Reinvestment will increase your stake balance, enhancing your future earnings through compound interest.
compound.importantDesc: After clicking "Confirm Reinvestment", wait on the screen while the transaction is processed on the blockchain. The screen will close automatically when the transaction is confirmed.
compound.errorExceedsLimit: Cannot reinvest. The amount to reinvest ({{rewardsValue}} {{symbol}}) exceeds the available limit ({{available}} {{symbol}}). Please claim your receivables first.

claim.title: Claim Rewards
claim.description: You are about to receive your accumulated rewards.
claim.noteDesc: Tokens will be sent directly to your wallet after confirmation.
claim.importantDesc: After clicking "Confirm", wait on the screen while the transaction is processed on the blockchain. The screen will close automatically when the transaction is confirmed.
